game_description: Transform your living room into a personal gym with a full-body VR workout and hand tracking. Jumping // Squatting // Pushups // Side Planks // Crunches // Running // Sprinting and Burpees to the beat of the music This is the Warmup to your next VR Fitness session, for the full VR fitness experience consider switching to VR Workout as well.
review_1: I’m waiting for the new release on the 10th with bated breath. If you have a copy available to try before release I will be more than happy to test it. I lost over 10 lbs just doing the boot camp.
review_2: I have used only the default workouts supplied in the application. It has helped with exercising more regularly. I really appreciate the use of hand gestures. Navigation feels very natural. As you need to have a registered account to save your workouts, I would really love to see a web based workout editor which would allow creation of playlist and customization of exercises to be done which would then be synced with the headset.
review_3: I love the workouts and even 3 minutes gets my heart going! But it has the 5 and 10 minute options locked. My profile menu says free tier which I assume might be the reason. But I can’t figure out where to find a way to unlock the other options through a payment or subscription or anything. So info on how to resolve that would be awesome!
review_4: If I can only keep one game for fitness, this is the game. Thank you devs! I need to play more to figure out how to hit the “hold” notes.
review_5: I think graphics would be worse than this.But if I only exercise, I recommend it (Replacing library images wouldn't be complicated. I want to change it to something neat
